operation.name: selectById
operation.sql: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where id=?

operation.name: updateByID
operation.sql: update s_role set name=?,remark=?,state=?,sort=? where id=?

operation.name: selectByName
operation.sql: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where name like '$name$%' order by sort

operation.name: getByName
operation.sql: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where name = ?

operation.name: getAllByStatus
operation.sql: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where state = 'state'
operation.sqlmap: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role <dynamic prepend="where"> <isNotEmpty property="state" prepend="and"> state=#state# </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>

operation.name: selectByUser
operation.sql: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where id in (select role_id from s_user_and_role where user_id='') and state=1
operation.sqlmap: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where id in (select role_id from s_user_and_role where user_id=#userId#) and state=1

operation.name: selectByNotUser
operation.sql: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where id in (select role_id from s_user_and_role where user_id='') and state=1
operation.sqlmap: select id,name,remark,state,sort from s_role where id not in (select role_id from s_user_and_role where user_id=#userId#) and state=1
